entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Field assignment perf regression in 7.0-rc2 #77346
  • Keep LineNumber, BytePositionInLine and Path when calling JsonSerializer.Deserialize<TValue>(ref reader) #77345
  • MEL logs only first element from array passed #77335
  • [wasm][aot] `S.R.IS.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes` failing on V8 #77334
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #77300
    8.0.0
  • [arm64] These benchmarks are faster on Rosetta-x64 than on native arm64 #60616
    Future
  • `swprintf` PAL tests are failing #77342
  • Consider increase to TwoDigitYearMax #75148
    8.0.0
  • .NET7 RC2 PrintDocument exception. #77340
  • Set profile weights correctly for the Internal blocks in JIT/Directed/UnrollLoop/loop3_il_d.exe #7727
    Future
  • Cannot load symbols for release project when "Publish Single File" is set to true - it want's to load "singlefilehost.pdb". #76601
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed: (*card_word)==0 in DynamicGenerics tests #76801
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT: fgDebugCheckBBlist (or similar) should check loop annotations #8944
    Future
  • JIT: clarify contract for fgRemoveStmt #6949
    Future
  • Directory.GetFiles throws DirectoryNotFoundException if path contains ''$'\240''a' on Linux #76877
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_17777\\GitHub_17777\\GitHub_17777.cmd #75177
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Avoid checking for exceptions after calls to Math icalls. #77347
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Convert Array icalls to use ObjectHandleOnStack. #77343
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement Array.Initialize in C# #77336
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Set DNER for all local fields #77341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete removed tests from list #77344
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Value of TwoDigitYearMax to 2049 #76848
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Use metadata names for SIMD intrinsic method recognition #76786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome for testing #77133
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Small improvements to get span item #77331
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use IndexOfAny{Except}InRange in RegexCompiler / source generator #76859
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, blocked, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update mask for lookup of `this` in CCW `ComWrappers` scenario #77302
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Flow the execution context into a green thread #2054
    area-green-threads

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Project file generated by dotnet tool restore should avoid importing Directory.Build.props and Directory.Build.targets #4281
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiline MSBuild properties are passed to analyzers as just empty strings #64917
  • DocumentationCommentId.GetSymbolsForDeclarationId does not work for methods with generic parameters on generic types #64915

Closed

  • style rule to remove accessibility modifier shows up as "Add accessibility modifier" in lightbulbs (IDE0040 Accessibility modifiers required) #64877
  • Source Generators - make WriteTo public for Syntax classes #64894
  • Roslyn/IDE: Add missing usings [multiple suggestions] #64657
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33021.259 #64913
  • Ref field initializer is treated as a value assignment #64725
    17.5
  • Syntax error parsing field initializer with `ref` expression #64720
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64914
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Change external access IVT project to correct name #64912
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64911
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Reduce the packaged size of the LSIF generator #64907
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow ref initializers for ref fields #64817
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64919
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Save the resx file after a button is added into the WinForm #64910
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - while snippet #64893
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow and emit `params` arrays in lambdas #64861
    Area-Compilers
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Only write out inVs properties when appropriate #64853
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • More flexibility in Blazor's navigation system regarding browser history to support multi-page browsing #44699
  • Framework does not handle Request cancellation properly #44697
  • Response Caching [ASP.NET Core 6 & 7]: cache populated for each concurrent connection rather than once #44696
  • CORS error when deploying Net 6 API on docker #44694
  • Blazor ComponentBase.SetParametersAsync(ParameterView.Empty) still create costly WriterForType despite ParameterView.Empty #44693

Closed

  • Blazor WASM MSAL with CustomAuthenticationStateProvider Gives Error #44692
  • Blazor WebAssembly app with IndividualB2C auth unable to retrieve access token #24216
    Backlog
  • Why the constructor access level of "Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost.ClientHandler" is "internal"? #44589

PullRequests

Created

  • fixed minor typos #44698
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2027411 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Use IndexOfAny(char, char) when possible #44687
    Perf
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fixed bug #19641 Routing ArgumentOutOfRangeException #44674
    area-runtime
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttrbute syntaxes #44663
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove temporary allocations from Identity #44557
    Perf, area-identity
  • Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #44668
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44688
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui BlazorWebView MacOS issues #10843
  • [Critical] Command + V and more crashes the application (macOS 13) #10842
  • Bind a decimal value to Entry without StringFormat alters my binded value. #10840
  • loading app to phone in debug mode #10837

PullRequests

Created

  • Run Android tests on background thread #10841
    community ✨
  • Fix minimum sizing for * cells with multiple children #10836

Created
